actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to assist former spouses of federal employees in obtaining court-ordered payments.

summary.text: Amends the Social Security Act to authorize the garnishment of salaries payable by the Federal Government for the enforcement of court-ordered payments to or on behalf of an employee's or official's spouse, former spouse, or children in addition to garnishment for alimony and child support payments presently authorized.

titles.title: A bill to assist former spouses of federal employees in obtaining court-ordered payments.
